title: Hacked acc
body: Someone loged in and gifted him self a bunch of skins . I lost all my Rp plss helpp i have the name of him

replies.body: We can help, rest easy!  Fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as you can, and our account team can help with recovery and look into repairs.  We got your back!
It dose not work because of captcha. And there is nowhere to put in the code.
No worries, reach out to us directly via support@riotgames.com, and we'll see you there.
